name: FnF.FM Bangla
description:
24-hour popular Bengali music in HD.
FnF.FM Bangla Radio – One of the most popular Bengali Radio on Internet. We broadcast 24 hour popular Bengali music in HD. Music from Bangladesh and West Bengal, India. We play modern Bengali songs, Popular Bengali Movie songs, Pop, Rabindra Sangeet, Nazrul Geeti, Baul Sangeet and much more. It is our job to give you what you want. So visit our website www.bn.FnF.fm and send us song request. Hope you going to love FnF.FM Bangla Radio! Keep listening Bengali music!

name: Bangladesh Betar
description: Bangladesh Betar, the national radio network has been discharging the honorous responsibility of disseminating information, education, entertainment with utmost commitment, honesty and objectivity for about seven decades. It functions to support nation building efforts of the Government upholding social values and the country’s rich historical and cultural heritage. Betar has been playing a pivotal role towards developing a knowledge based information society taking advantage of its unique and distinctive capacity as the cheapest and most versatile medium to reach to the grass root level.

description: Radio Shongi is a 24/7 Live Online Radio. Radio Shongi is proud of its strong varieties of program focus. Our aim is to work with our Bangla Culture, folk songs and as well new generation Bangla Songs. Radio Shongi has a large network in Bangladesh & UAE as well in abroad. We can assist you, not just on an organizational level, but also on a strategic level. By creating the concept, design and content of your events or programs under one roof, we ensure continuity, integrity and consistency throughout every element.

name: Roots air
description: Located in the city of Dhaka, Roots Air is an internet radio station dedicated to the underground music produced in Bangladesh. This radio is on air 24 hours a day, all year round.

name: ColoursFM
description: ColoursFM 101.6 is a young radio station that started its journey in January 2014. ColoursFM targets young women from the age range of 18-35 years. Our main purpose is to be a friend, guide, philosopher - that “person” you can come to when you need anything at all. At ColoursFM we want to give our guidance to all the girls and women out there who need help not only with beauty, fashion, health, fitness, legal and finance but anything and everything you can name of. We want them to know what their rights are, at the same time we want to entertain them with the latest and old music. Everybody has their preference, but we want to make sure that we listen to what they have to say.

name: Radio Ullash
description:
About Radio Ullash
Radio Ullash is a pioneer radio channel which is broadcasting English, Hindi, Bengali, and other music for its listeners. Currently, we have four workstations that are based in New York (USA), Frankfurt (Germany), India (Delhi), and Dhaka (Bangladesh). Our slogan is: "Music For Spirit". 'Ullash' is a Bengali word. It means 'Delight, Joy, Jollity, Merriment, Glee, Elation, Mirth, etc.
